title: Question about the premium chest at level 5
body: So I recently started this account to main ornn, and I have heard that if I open a premium chest I get a skin from the champions I own. If ornn is the only champion I own, do I get a skin for him from the premium chest?

replies.body: You won't be able to get the Dark Star Orianna skin, but you'll likely get 1 of those other 3 from her assuming she's your only owned champion.
not the oriana though, I meant the new champion ornn. Since Ornn's only skin is worth 1350 ip, will I not be able to get the skin?
Oh I misread. You won't get Ornn's skin, because it's too expensive for what they offer. You'd get a random one.

The new player chest should offer content to forge Ashe and Garen.  The other chest you receive is still random, so you're not guaranteed to receive skin shards for champion already unlocked on the account.
